STRING
ansible-vault encrypt_string <mysecuretext> --vault-password-file /private/vaultkey


password: !vault |
          $ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
          31303337393236336461383739383434376562373662376531633834396131636139643631633137

          3033


FILE
ansible-vault encrypt <file> --vault-password-file /private/vaultkey
